User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0a2) Gecko/20110714 Firefox/7.0a2
Build ID: 20110714042001

Steps to reproduce:

Moved three toolbar icons added by extensions from the addon bar to the navigation bar. Also added the RSS icon to the navigation bar, and moved the position of the home button.


Actual results:

Upon restart, the RSS button and Home button changes were saved. Two of the three addon icons reverted to the addon bar, however, and the addon bar was re-enabled after being hidden.


Expected results:

Changes should have been saved.

I did see issue 640070 which sounds like something similar has been happening in 3x and 4x, but it seems to relate to ANY changes not being saved. The extensions in question are all jetpack extensions. I tried to test with my last extension which is not jetpack, but I actually cannot move it at all; trying to drag it when in the customize window brings up its context menu instead.

I am currently running Aurora 7.0a2 from 2011-07-14, but it occurred in a previous build as well. Additionally, I can duplicate this in the main channel, Firefox 5.
